passives.name: Fist Extension
passives.desc:
Fist use count +1

When using Fist、 Fist+:
 • Slight BRV damage boost
 • Slight PHY ATK Up boost、 duration +2
 • Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit

passives.name: All Thunder Attack
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's ATK in Thunder mode
passives.short_desc: All Thunder Attack: Raises party's ATK

passives.name: Raijin Special Extension
passives.desc:
Raijin Special use count +2

When using Raijin Special、 Raijin Special+:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Slight MAX BRV Up boost

When using Raijin Special+:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When using BRV Attack+:
 • Slight BRV damage boost
passives.short_desc: Raijin Special Extension: Boost to Raijin Special
